references.paper_title: Diffusion policy: Visuomotor policy learning via action diffusion.
references.reason: This paper introduces the diffusion policy used for imitation learning in the experiments.

references.paper_title: Development and control of a holonomic mobile robot for mobile manipulation tasks.
references.reason: This paper provides the kinematic model used for the powered-caster vehicle, which is the basis for the holonomic mobile base design.

references.paper_title: Mobile aloha: Learning bimanual mobile manipulation with low-cost whole-body teleoperation.
references.reason: This paper describes Mobile ALOHA, a comparable system for collecting mobile manipulation data, and provides context for the authors' contributions.

references.paper_title: Consistency policy: Accelerated visuomotor policies via consistency distillation.
references.reason: This paper introduces consistency policy, another important imitation learning technique relevant to the work.

references.paper_title: Roboturk: A crowdsourcing platform for robotic skill learning through imitation.
references.reason: This paper describes Roboturk, a system for teleoperating robots using mobile devices, and is highly relevant to the proposed mobile phone teleoperation interface.
